snippet.title: Gradius ORIGINS – Announcement Trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Gradius ORIGINS is coming to Nintendo Switch on August 7, 2025. Pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/gradius-origins-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=A1013-01&utm_id=A1013-01

It's time to venture into deep space and face off against relentless alien forces in GRADIUS ORIGINS, a collection that brings together six legendary arcade classics and the all-new SALAMANDER III. Pilot your ship through dangerous enemy lines, upgrade your weapons, and master this intense, fast-paced adventure.

#NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect #GRADIUSORIGINS

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
